message: Let's split fairly, Bob.  A little more for me to start since I offered first.
I think a more even split is fair, considering the next round will decrease the value of the money. Let's start with a 55/45 split in my favor this time.
Bob, let's be realistic. The longer this goes on, the less we both get. I propose a 50/50 split. This is the fairest and fastest way to end this.
